what.lead: Establish a Federal Europe with a European Government,
what.text: headed by a Prime Minister elected by the Parliament, and with a President elected by the people. This will create a strong, open and transparent European parliamentary democracy.

what.lead: Enable the creation of real EU political parties.
what.text: Current EU parties are loose coalitions of national parties, often with conflicting interests; a real EU democracy needs strong parties defending their vision of the future of Europe.
